name: Tea Fanmade Sprites FNF
description:
I animated these sprites of my character, Tea a few months ago, but I decided to make a fan-made sprite project! (I don't know what to call it lol) 

Controls:

The controls are simple, really! For her singing sprites, use the arrow keys. For her miss sprites, use the WASD keys.

Yeah, that's pretty much it for the details. I might update this, but who knows?
